tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: We consulted Dr. Sindhu (Eshwar Clinic) throughout the entire phase of my Pregnancy. From day 1 we had very good experience. She was so positive providing proper guidance and suggesting recommended treatments wherever required. Especially during my 3rd trimester had complications with AFI, HB level and this was treated properly by continuous monitoring. She clarifies all my queries in specific my husband's queries without any negligence and made us confident for delivery. During the last trimester advised for continuous checkup so that we are held up with critical situation. Due to the constant review, support and care I delivered girl baby normally. We are really thankful to her.

We have consulted Dr.Sindhu Bhargavi throughout the process of pregnancy for my wife .We are blessed with beautiful baby girl last week through normal delivery.She was very caring and showed lot of patience in explaining things.During last phase of pregnancy,doctor used to call/msg my wife regularly to check on her.My wife had a bit of difficulty during labour,but doctor made it a normal delivery.We are thankful and highly recommend her.

Firstly, we are so thankful to Dr.Sindhu Bhargavi who showed her tremendous support all through the pregnancy journey for both of my kids. We went to Dr.Sindhu during our critical phase, there were so many complications for both the pregnancies but she guided us very well. She is very friendly, very positive and kind.100% trustable doctor and no one will regret after consulting with Dr.Sindhu. Thank you Doctor for your wonderful support. You are an angel sent to us. God bless your profession.

Me & my wife started consulting Dr Sindhu Bhargavi about 8 months back. Doctor is very caring & explained all the things in detail. Last week my wife delivered a healthy baby. Doctor guided us through the whole process. 
Very thankful with her guidance.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: **** ******* Recommended for all gynaecological issues. Speaks very friendly.  Explains the cause of the problem very well

she is very good and very good humanity, thank you very much doctor sindhu.
Getting more confidence whenever consult with her.

We are thankful to Dr. Sindhu for proper guidance and consultation. She explained each and every step in detail and supported us with every means during this Covid Pandemic. She is very kind and caring. We would love recommend her to all.
